# maximumDistance

**Instance Property**

The distance beyond which the node applies no further attenuation, in meters.

## Declaration

```swift
var maximumDistance: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `100000.0` meters.

This property is relevant for [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioEnvironmentDistanceAttenuationModel/inverse].

## Getting and Setting the Attenuation Values

- **referenceDistance**: The minimum distance at which the node applies attenuation, in meters.
- **rolloffFactor**: A factor that determines the attenuation curve.
